This game is the most frustrating thing to play.  Hit registration doesn't register a quarter of the time.  The other 3 quarters of the time it does it shouldn't.  This is from killer side and survivor side.  Bugs are still in the game that are still there from launch.  There are certain perks in the game which are a must to even be competitive within the game at high rank.  Dead Hard, Borrowed Time, Sprint Burst, Decisive Strike on the survivor side.  Hex: Ruin or Pop Goes the Weasel, No One Escapes Death is almost a requirement at higher ranks on killer depending on who you're playing.  The games killers are no where near balanced near the same power level as each other.  Some killers frankly way out perform others.  Spirit is top of the food chain.  Has been for 2+ years now.  Then you've got the toxic player base whom if they escape. They call you bad.  If they don't they call you a camper.  All together one of the most unfun games I've ever had the mispleasure of playing.  

Low ranks are great.  No one has to use shitty builds and gets to actually have a relaxing match and that's the part I look forward to the most is the monthly rank reset.  Guess what bugged out this month though?!  The monthly reset.  I'm still stuck at the highest rank of play while others were reset further than they were supposed to be.  Games has been out 5 years and there are still bugs like this?  Rank reset has been established for 3 years and all of a sudden it breaks?  This is the competency of BHVR.  Stay away from this game.

Is it really annoying sometimes? yes, but all things considered it's still good fun, playing as either a survivor who has to complete 5 objectives, these are scattered among many maps, after these objectives are done then survivors must leave through either an exit gate or a secondary means of exit called a hatch. Players can also be the killer, these people will try and stop the survivors from finishing their objectives. The killer must also attack the survivors, once they have been hit twice they can be put onto hooks, after this action has been done three times, the survivor is removed from the game, when all of the survivors have this happen the killer wins the game

Personally I find the game very fun, I play killer myself and enjoy trying to catch the survivors and outsmart them, there is a very strong grinding system which may turn some people off because of the time commitment, there is also possibly an investment of money if you want to unlock all of the killers and survivors, overall I enjoy the game personally, but I can see how it's not for everyone

Estás constantemente aprendiendo ya que siempre hay algo que mejorar o sale algo nuevo etc. Tiene sus bugs que a veces dan un coñazo pero al final es como todos los juegos.

个人喜欢玩屠夫，玩了100多个小时，这个游戏总体比较简单，一两个月就能达到一段。但是这个游戏仅仅是1v4的对抗，就因为很多低素质的玩家而导致人屠关系恶劣，当你四杀后大概率会有人在你的steam留言骂你，这一点也比较无语。我希望素质较低或者心理素质较差的玩家进行现实生活中的治疗而非进行网络游戏，这样人屠关系能得到改善，这也是我们所有人希望发生的。
制作组不修复BUG就算了，2021年的网游还要丢档，丢档发了邮件就给一点点血点补偿，然后就装死，直接不回复了，真行嗷艹
